alert.note: Alert for Clark; Clay; Crawford; Cumberland; Edgar; Effingham; Jasper; Richland (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 12:48AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Coles, northwestern Crawford, southeastern Edgar, Jasper, Clark, northwestern Richland, southeastern Cumberland, northern Clay and Effingham Counties through 115 AM CDT... At 1247 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Terre Haute to Edgewood. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Bible Grove around 105 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Louisville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 between mile markers 142 and 160, and between mile markers 162 and 164. Interstate 70 between mile markers 79 and 94, and between mile markers 96 and 154. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Clark; Clay; Crawford; Cumberland; Edgar; Effingham; Jasper; Richland
